level.text: An owner may seek judicial review before the District of Columbia Superior Court within five (5) days of:
The President or his or her designee mailing notice of a final decision under ยง 1509.1; or
The President or his or her designee mailing or delivering notice that the owner has failed to comply with the conditions of release pursuant to ยง 1511.
Source: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 316 (January 9, 2009)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published 56 DCR 2374, 2383 (March 27, 2009).
